svg.source:
Title : Game flow (machine rocks)
No.of round is 1
Participant failed to select the drawing word within the given time
All Participant failed to provide correct answer within the given time
participant Participant_1 as p1 participant Server as server participant Participant_2 as p2 participant DB as db participant Scheduler as scheduler p1 --> server : connect p2 --> server : connect p1 --> server : create game p2 --> server : join game p1 --> server : request to start game server -> db : assign roles server -> db : update game status as started server -> p1 : start game server -> p2 : start game p1 --> server : get game state p2 --> server : get game state server -> p1 : game state as 'select word' server -> p2 : game state as 'waiting' p1 --> server : get list of words server -> scheduler : schedule task to auto select drawing word(w1) server -> db : update game play info with 'w1' task id server -> p1 : list of words note left of db : Participant didn't select any word scheduler -> server : auto select a word (w1 task kicks-in)
server -> scheduler : schedule task to auto end this new drawing session (d1) server -> p1 : game state as 'drawer' server -> p2 : game state as 'view' with hint
p2 --> server : answer server -> p2 : wrong answer p2 --> server : answer server -> p2 : wrong answer note left of db :didn't receive a correct answer from
all participant (d1 task kicks-in) scheduler -> server : end current drawing session server -> db : Update participant score server -> scheduler : game is not completed yet,
so schdule task to dismiss leader board(l1) server -> p1 : game state as leader board server -> p2 : game state as leader board scheduler -> server : dismiss leader board(l1) server -> db : assign roles server -> db : increment round number if all user completed a round server -> p1 : game state as 'waiting' server -> p2 : game state as 'select word' p2 --> server : get list of words server -> scheduler : schedule task to auto select drawing word (w2) server -> db : update game play info with 'w2' task id server -> p2 : list of words note left of db : Participant didn't select any word scheduler -> server : auto select a word (w2 task kicks-in)
server -> scheduler : schedule task to auto end this drawing session (d2) server -> p1 : game state as 'viewer' with hint server -> p2 : game state as 'drawer'
p1 --> server : answer server -> p1 : wrong answer note left of db :didn't receive a correct answer from
all participant (d2 task kicks-in) scheduler -> server : end current drawing session server -> db : update participant score note left of db : game is completed server -> p1 : show final score board server -> p2 : show final score board
svg.desc: Game flow (machine rocks) No.of round is 1 Participant failed to select the drawing word within the given time All Participant failed to provide correct answer within the given time

text.tspan: Participant failed to select the drawing word within the given time
All Participant failed to provide correct answer within the given time
schedule task to auto select drawing word(w1)
update game play info with 'w1' task id
auto select a word (w1 task kicks-in)
schedule task to auto end this new drawing session (d1)
didn't receive a correct answer from
so schdule task to dismiss leader board(l1)
increment round number if all user completed a round
schedule task to auto select drawing word (w2)
update game play info with 'w2' task id
auto select a word (w2 task kicks-in)
schedule task to auto end this drawing session (d2)
didn't receive a correct answer from
